arStrings.szText: Hitting an enemy at least {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} times with the same cast of {c_important}Charged Bolts{/c} releases a lightning nova, dealing {c_number}{payload:SKILLRANK_NOVA_DAMAGE}{/c} damage to enemies around them.
Hitting an enemy with {c_important}Charged Bolts{/c} reduces their damage dealt by {c_number}[{SF_15} * 100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_16}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Charged Bolts{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_27}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to Stunned enemies.
